statements: DELETE FROM Lab_Results WHERE patient_id = 202 AND test_name = 'Blood Test';
DELETE FROM Lab_Results WHERE result_id = 101 AND patient_id = 201;
DELETE FROM Lab_Results WHERE test_name = 'Blood Test' AND result_value > 50;

DELETE FROM ClinicalDecisions WHERE patient_id = 100 AND decision_date = '2022-02-15';
DELETE FROM Lab_Results WHERE result_date < '2022-01-01' AND result_value > 100;
